answers.answer: eliasamor,I am guessing you are responding to a question someone posted.I am a volunteer for this Type 1 Diabetes Forum and did not want to disregard or ignore your posting.Thank you for the information that might be helpful to someone who previously posted.If I misunderstood your posting and you had a specific question, please re-post your Question and I will answer it to the best of my ability.Thank you.

question: I have been using incontinence products for about 8 yrs now (Diagnosed with a Nourogenic Bladder) and have tried many different brands for night time protection but of all I have tried, Mega Careline is the most absorbent, comfortable and cost efficient one I have ever used.Read the full testomonial at: http://www.adult-diapers-briefs.comJames,Massachusetts
title: Overnight Brief
